prompt.content: Calculate the percentage of Danaos Corporation's (NYSE:DAC) FY 2024 total comprehensive income that was attributable to unrealized fair-value movements on the Companyâ€™s investment in Star Bulk Carriers Corp. (NASDAQ: SBLK). Round to the nearest two decimals.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find Danaos's FY2024 total comprehensive income as $510.622 million"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find Danaos's FY2024 unrealized fair value movement on its SBLK investment as -$25.2 million"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculated the percentage as (-$25.2 million / $510.622 million) * 100 = -4.94% "}]
